description:
All I can say about Dirk is... wow! He's got to be one of the most beautiful men I've ever laid eyes on. Great smile, crystal blue/green eyes, lean, tight body.
He's a straight married bartender who was looking to do a little modeling. He and his wife have been together for a little under a year. When I asked if she knew that he was doing this, he got this sheepish grin on his face and said that she doesn't speak English very well (she's from Brazil). So I'm guessing no <grin>.
Dirk is very, very sexual and he loves getting off. Over the course of shooting that day, we got two nice big loads out of him!
title: Dirk
